attributes.action: Reject David Cameron's resignation and ask him to lead the BREXIT negotiations.
attributes.background: He called for the referendum and now in this moment of crisis as an elected leader he should lead the Brexit negotiations in the best interest of the country. None of the leaders in the Leave campaign have the capability, sensibility, leadership qualities or people's mandate to lead the negotiations

rejection.details: The resignation of an individual Minister, including the Prime Minister, is not a decision for the Government or Parliament as a whole. It is a decision for the individual concerned. The UK Government or Parliament cannot stop a Minister resigning.
